about.title: Professional Profile
about.description: Mechatronics Engineer in training with a track record in technical leadership, international robotics, and Generative AI consulting. Founder of SCIBARU AI and international mentor in STEM competitions. My approach combines precise technical execution with strategic vision to lead teams and generate sustainable solutions in educational and business contexts.

items.description: Operational and strategic leadership of last-mile logistics. Management of +16,500 monthly packages and development of proprietary digital tools (BaruLogix).
Applied consulting in Generative AI. Design of training programs and strategic advice for the adoption of 4IR technologies in organizations.
Technical and strategic mentorship in international robotics. Leadership in mechanical design and international relations representing Colombia.
Development of platforms such as BaruLogix and Eduqualityco, optimizing operational and educational processes through custom web solutions.
